tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_intake (
  date DATE,
  waste_type VARCHAR,
  weight FLOAT,
  PRIMARY KEY (date)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_composition (
  composition_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  composition_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE waste_categorization (
  categorization_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type VARCHAR,
  composition_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE daily_waste_intake (
    date DATE PRIMARY KEY,
    organic_waste DECIMAL,
    plastic_waste DECIMAL,
    paper_waste DECIMAL,
    landfill_waste DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE daily_waste_intake (
    waste_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    quantity DECIMAL,
    location VARCHAR,
    disposal_method VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE waste_composition (
    composition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    waste_id UUID,
    composition_type VARCHAR,
    composition_percentage DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (waste_id) REFERENCES daily_waste_intake(waste_id)
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
    impact_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    composition_id UUID,
    impact_type VARCHAR,
    severity VARCHAR,
    FOREIGN KEY (composition_id) REFERENCES waste_composition(composition_id)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_category (
    category_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE impact_assessment (
    assessment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    impact_id UUID,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessment_result VARCHAR,
    FOREIGN KEY (impact_id) REFERENCES environmental_impact(impact_id)
)
